intent_atoms.description: Expand ISOInspectorCLI DocC catalog with a tutorial on capturing research logs for annotation reviews, including cross-links to app workflows and new CLI screenshot assets.
Expand ISOInspectorApp DocC catalog with a tutorial on annotating and bookmarking MP4 investigations, covering persistence steps and supporting screenshots.
Tutorial files are added under both DocC catalogs along with generated PNG resources.
Catalog landing pages are updated to surface the new tutorials within the overview and topics sections.
The system must continue to pass swift test and python3 scripts/fix_markdown.py validation after changes.

functional_units.name: Capture Research Logs for Annotation Reviews
functional_units.description: CLI feature that captures research logs during annotation reviews

functional_units.name: Annotate and Bookmark MP4 Investigations
functional_units.description: App feature allowing users to annotate and bookmark sections of MP4 investigations with persistence

functional_units.name: DocC Catalog Landing Page Update
functional_units.description: UI component that surfaces new tutorials within overview and topics sections of the DocC catalog

functional_units.name: CLI Screenshot Asset Generation
functional_units.description: Process that generates PNG assets for CLI screenshots used in documentation

functional_units.name: Documentation Asset Management
functional_units.description: System managing tutorial files and generated resources across ISOInspectorCLI and ISOInspectorApp DocC catalogs
